resources.string:
Asmita is the Annual Sports Fest of IIIT Allahabad. As one of the largest sports fests of India , it is a medium to promote sports and inculcate healthy ... IIIT-A is one of the best experience anyone can have, be it the 24 hours open labs (which is generally used as a battleground for late night inter-department CS matches which usually extends till early dawn) or the football enthusiasts (U can find them fighting for the ball at 3 AM on a cold foggy December night, if u are passing by the ground)..
